# Class Master

[baseUrl : class_masater]

# To retreive all records of class master.

Method : GET
Endpoint : /all

# Incoming Parameters

NameData Type
idObjectID
standardString
divisionString

TIP

Example
http://<yourdomain>/class_master/all

# To create a record of class master.

Method : POST
Endpoint : /create

# Parameters

NameData Type
standardString
divisionString

TIP

Example
http://<yourdomain>/class_master/create

Request Body

{  
    standard:'I',  
    division:'A'
}
